body_html:
This just happened to me too and seems the problem is that TFRecord does not recognize that the file is compressed (i.e. GZIP). You need to explicitly configure it using the options, i.e:

options = tf.python_io.TFRecordOptions(tf.python_io.TFRecordCompressionType.GZIP)
body_text:
This just happened to me too and seems the problem is that TFRecord does not recognize that the file is compressed (i.e. GZIP). You need to explicitly configure it using the options, i.e:
options = tf.python_io.TFRecordOptions(tf.python_io.TFRecordCompressionType.GZIP)
body:
This just happened to me too and seems the problem is that TFRecord does not recognize that the file is compressed (i.e. GZIP). You need to _explicitly_ configure it using the options, i.e:

```
options = tf.python_io.TFRecordOptions(tf.python_io.TFRecordCompressionType.GZIP)
```
